content: Donald Trump inherited at least 413 million dollars from his father. His businesses have all been enormous failures. It's unknown how much of daddy's money, if any, he has left.
translations: ita:Donald Trump ha ereditato almeno 413 milioni di dollari da suo padre. Le sue imprese sono state tutte disastrose. Non Ã¨
